title: Key Combinations and Caps Lock not passing through if using mRemoteNG through TeamViewer
author: strajk-
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Copy and Paste using key combination or any other command such as WIN+E, writing with caps lock or using shift to write in upper case letters should work using TeamViewer -> mRemoteNG
In both applications the setting is enabled to have them passthrough.

## Current Behavior
No key combinations work and even if caps lock is enabled it will still not write in upper case.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Connect to PC which will have mRemoteNG installed with TeamVie...
